resources.string: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. served in a capucino cup
Espresso with added hot water (100-150ml). Often served in a cappuciino cup.
a tall, mid \'milk coffee\' (about 100-150ml). an espresso with steamed milk and only a little milk foam.

old brew is a coffee brewing method where coarse coffee grounds are steeped in cool or room-temperature water for 12 to 24 hours, resulting in a concentrated coffee extract with a smoother, less acidic, and sweeter flavor than conventionally brewed coffee.

"Mocha" refers to a chocolate and coffee flavoring or a drink made with espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk, originating from the port of Mocha, Yemen, which historically traded coffee with a chocolatey flavor.
